rules_text:
Signature – Ami Ryoka, Mayor; Taki Ryoka, Househusband [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
When Suzuna Ryoka, Kid Hero enters, destroy all other creatures without bystander.
notes: Named by Ami Ryoka, Mayor and Taki Ryoka, Househusband (frame issue)
